description: Biofértil Vital, founded on December 26, 2016, addresses environmental conservation and organic waste management through innovative bacterial inoculation technology. This unique approach enables efficient composting in small spaces, achieving biodegradation of large volumes of organic matter within 30 to 45 days, while ensuring zero greenhouse gas emissions. The company has gained recognition both nationally and internationally, exporting its products and expanding its services to include organic waste disposal, contributing significantly to sustainable agriculture.
name: Biofértil Vital
